title: This Headset COOLS Your Ears!  HP Omen Mindframe
description: The HP Omen Mindframe is the first gaming headset that actively cools your ears while in use.  But does it actually work or is it more of a gimmick? Are these the best affordable gaming headphones you can buy?  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Toshiba RC100:   HP Mindframe:   HD58x:   GSP500:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by HP. This video is sponsored by Toshiba. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #hpomenmindframe #hardwarecanucks
